title: Worth every penny
review:
As my budget was tight so i reviewed many products and finalised this TV. Brought it on regular price which was 18000 at that time.

TV was delivered in 3 days. I myself opened the box as there is no wall mount is given in package i attached the stands. It was easy to attach there are only 4 screws.

Set up tv with videocon d2h normal connection and turned it on. I previously used my CRT monitor with Tv tuner card. And after watching channels on this tv i found the colors are over bright and clarity is somewhat unclear. After playing with color and other settings the clarity and brightness got perfect.

There are 3 most useful color settings 

Dynamic- If you have seen samsung super Amoled screen phones then is is same to that. Punchy and more vibrant colors.

Standard- Regular and soft colors

Movie- Slightly yellowish effect 

I played 720p and 1080p videos and the clarity was awesome.
1080p 60FPS videos lag sometimes but no one watch 60FPS because regular movies and videos are 30 fps.

Coming to the sound this TV has slightly low sound 10w but for small room it is not a problem. There are also sound settings like movie , vocals and other. And DTS surrounding which is not much effective.

But tjere is also and 3.5mm audio output so you can switch anytime with clicks to Tv autio to home theaters.

Overall i found this Tv is a great deal.

Pros:- 
High contrast ratio
Vibrant colors
2 years warranty
Many modes like indian cinema, movie , game etc
Amazing viewing angles

Cons:-

The colors are over saturated than SONY tv. They may look pleasant to eyes but they are not 100% accurate.

The hardware refresh rate is 50-60Hz. And samsung tells 100Hz which is software optimized rate and not real.

You may need extended usb cable if you mount this Tv on wall because the usb port is on back side. Not in side panel.




If you just want brand in budget then buy this TV. Bacause in same range or may be at cheaper rate you get VU FULL HD 32 inch and believe me no difference in screen quality. 
And if you want to see everything as it is same as real life like picture quality then buy SONY 29 IINCH led tv.

Thumbs up if you found it useful ?

title: Economic option. Don't expect a lot.
review:
Positives:

- Sound quality: Worth the money.
- Picture quality: Worth the money.
- Product weight: Very light weight. Can easily carry around while shifting houses.

Negatives:

- All integration points (input plug points like HDMI, USB) are facing the wall and not side ways. So you will have issues in easy plug-and-play if you are wall mounting it. Please beware. 
- Don't expect network connectivity at this price. Just plug a Chromecast and stream whatever you want or plug a USB and play what ever you want.

Buy this TV if you have a 10-12 feet hall. If its more, you may have to go for bigger screen.

title: Must buy!
review:
Why I gavee 5 starts to this TV Samsung 32J4003 TV.

Reasons: 
1. Delivery
2. TV features and Performance
3. Samsung Free of cost TV Installation service.

So let's start in detail:

1. Delivery: Flipkart delivery is very fast & safe. Delivery person was very good in nature.

2. TV feature and Performance: I like this  TV because it have Cricket Mode, Indian Cinema mode and game mode too.
Picture quality is very good and sound is enough for a wide room.
I have Dish TV HD+ connection and it produce very good picture quality while watching HD TV channels.
I also connect this TV with my laptop using HDMI cable.
I bought this TV on No cost EMI for 17999.00 only.

3. Samsung Free of cost TV Installation service: I got this TV without wall mount and got only table stand but thanks to Flipkart again after delivery of this TV I got a SMS from Flipkart that a Samsung engineer will install my TV within next 48 hours .
A Samsung engineer call me next day and come with wall-mount and install the TV on the wall without any cost.

Recommendation: Do not purchase any additional Wall-mount for this Samsung 32J4003 TV because Samsung engineer will carry your wallmount and install it without any cost.

So, thanks to Flipkart and Samsung for fast & safe delivery and also free of cost Installation and demo service.

Thanks,
Shailendra Singh.

title: AUDIO QUALITY IS VERY VERY POOR

title: Improper Design of TV

title: overall good product
review:
Tv comes with very nice display panel which detailed picture quality & multiple picture modes for different occasions. I must say at this price range.

Pros

- good picture quality
- so many options in the settings for picture adjustment
- using this since 7 moths no issues at all

Cons

- extremely poor sound quality
- but it can eradicated by using a external speaker 

If its helpful please give a thumbs up !!!

title: Mischievous information, warranty not as advertised.

title: Brilliant
review:
Excellent experience from Flipkart. Got the TV delivered on time and you know I got the Samsung technician details even before the TV got delivered. TV got installed within hours after the TV was delivered. 

Coming to the TV aspect, worth every penny you spent. I exchanged my older LCD TV for 4500Rs and got this for 12 k. TV clarity is top notch. Sound is fine. Only problem is with accessibility of the HDMI and USB ports if you going to Wall mount. Otherwise, I am good with this TV.

title: Does the job
review: Product is no doubtly good as espected from samsung as I brought it in 16440. But one backdrop is usb port is on the back side which makes it impossible to insert usb when the tv is in wall mount. You can use an usb extention cable to solve that problem. Another is sound is not that much loud but ok for medium size room.

title: Installation Problem
review: Product is very nice but I am very unsatisfied from your installation, Because after wall mounting of TV there is no space for the mounting of Pen drive & HDMI cables. So its very serious issue & i need your help to solve this problem.

title: Fair
review:
I brought this TV in flipkart big billion day for 16K..
Pros:
+Picture quality is decent 
+Supports all kind of formats with out any troubles
Cons:
 -only one USB port and also It not a Hdd USB port which means it doesn't support external hard disk of higher capacity.I tried with 1tb hardisk it's not recognizing, then I used 8gb pen drive it's working fine..I checked with Samsung support they told me it won't support Hard disk.Thts a big disappointment fa me. now days it's not fair if we don't have that option.
- I felt that the sound quality it produces is poor below average. I should go fa speakers the inbuilt one sounds very low quality fa me..

Overall with two years warranty and decent picture quality,good service, reasonable price  makes it okay to buy.
